summary: Web application with public backend API - all functions accessible without authentication
architectural_notes: Backend API is fully public with no authentication or authorization checks
All functions callable by anonymous/guest users without restrictions

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all caller checks and authentication requirements from backend
Enable full guest access to all site features and actions
Remove all msg.caller verification logic from every backend function in backend/main.mo so that all functions are publicly accessible without any authentication or authorization checks
Remove the initAccessControl function call and any related access control initialization logic from the backend
Remove any remaining authentication-related logic from frontend hooks (useActor.ts) that calls initAccessControl or depends on authentication state for authorization

projectName: Remove all authentication and caller checks to enable full guest access
